name: Mobilus Labs
slogan: Frictionless Voice Communications for teams of any size at any range

team.title: CEO
team.name: Jordan McRae
team.bioHtml: Founder & CEO of OCTO23 Technologies; Inventor, Entrepreneur, and Explorer; Worked at @Lockheed Martin; Engineering degrees from MIT & Stanford.

jobs.title: Electronics Engineer
jobs.description:
THE ROLE: 
Join an elite engineering-driven team and have an immediate impact on defining what “voice as the next platform” truly means!  Mobilus Labs is looking for a passionate Electronics Engineer who loves designing, building, and testing complex systems with a user centric approach.  This role will join the team as an Electronics Engineer to assist in building the Mobilus wearable voice device in a collaborative environment.  You will be collaborating with fellow engineers, designers, and product managers in agile development with user testing in the loop.  This role will also give our new team member the opportunity to explore new technologies and approaches in PCB design, rapid prototyping, bone conduction elements and audio circuit design.  

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
-	Design, build, and test Mobilus communication modules.
-	Work with engineering and design team to ensure proper mechanical and electronic integration.
-	Redesign PCB layout for improved audio quality and noise reduction.
-	Integrate UHF radio modules into circuit design.
-	Optimize and maintain the bill of materials (BOM) for mass production of the electronics systems.

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
-	B.S. in Electronics Engineering or equivalent work experience.
-	4+ years of electronics design/production experience.
-	Strong proficiency in PCB design and rapid prototyping.
-	Experience in analog audio circuit design and optimization.
-	Experience in RF communications and Bluetooth.
-	Independent with good communication and team working skills.

"NICE TO HAVE" SKILLS
-	Previous experience in wireless voice communication projects.
-	Experience in antenna design.
-	Experience in vibration transducer components and/or bone conduction systems.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer (Mobile)
jobs.description:
THE ROLE:
Join an  elite engineering-driven team and have an immediate impact on defining what “voice as the next platform” truly means!  Mobilus Labs is looking for a passionate Full-Stack Software Developer who loves designing, developing, and testing complex systems with a user centric approach.  This role will join the team as a Software Developer to build the Mobilus software platform and mobile app in a collaborative environment.  You will be collaborating with fellow engineers, designers, and product managers in agile development with hardware in the loop.  This role will also give our new team member the opportunity to explore new technologies in advanced networking techniques, voice recognition, and voice based UX design.  

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
-	Continue the development of the Mobilus Voice Communication mobile application (Android).
-	Develop and Implement automatic multi-network (VoIP & P2P) switching features.
-	Advance the development of persistent voice channels feature.
-	Support user testing and development feedback

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:
-	B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent work experience
-	Strong proficiency in Java and/or C/C++ programming and debugging
-	Experienced knowledge and understanding of the Android SDK, APIs and libraries
-	Proficiency using modern front-end frameworks such as React, Ember.js, or AngularJS
-	Efficient unit and integration testing
-	Independent with good communication and team working skills.

"NICE TO HAVE" SKILLS:
-	Previous experience with wearables and/or hardware integration (i.e. Bluetooth, SCO, HFP)
-	Prior experience with VoIP and understanding of networking protocols (TCP/IP/UDP)
-	Experience with voice recognition and transcription libraries and/or APIs

jobs.title: Sr. Mechanical Engineer / Product Design
jobs.description:
THE ROLE:
Join an elite engineering-driven team and have an immediate impact on defining what “voice as the next platform” truly means! Mobilus Labs is looking for a passionate Mechanical Engineer who loves designing, building, and testing complex wearable systems with a user centric approach. This role will join the team as a Mechanical Engineer to assist in building the Mobilus wearable voice device in a collaborative environment. You will be collaborating with fellow engineers, designers, and product managers in agile development with user testing in the loop. This role will also give our new team member the opportunity to explore new technologies in rapid prototyping, 3D printing, and mass manufacturing.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Design Mobilus voice wearable for function, human factors, and manufacturability.
- Use in house facilities to rapid prototype and test mechanical components.
- Manage the subsystem and/or individual part designs from concept to production.
- Advance the design of vibration isolation between acoustic components.
- Manage mass production and system integration.
- Support user testing and development feedback.

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:
- M.S. in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent work experience.
- 4+ years of product design/prototyping experience.
- Strong proficiency in 3D design modeling and simulation (Autodesk, Solidworks, etc.)
- Experience across manufacturing techniques (Machining, 3D printing, injection molding, etc.)
- Experience in design for manufacture (DFM) and design for assembly (DFA).
- Independent with good communication and team working skills.

"NICE TO HAVE" SKILLS
- Previous experience designing and building wearables or other other digital devices (mobile phones, handheld radio, camera, etc.)

jobs.title: Front-End Developer
jobs.description:
The Role :
Join an elite engineering-driven team and have an immediate impact on defining what “voice as the next platform” truly means!  Mobilus Labs is looking for a passionate Front End Developer who loves designing, building, and testing complex interfaces with a user centric approach.  This role will join the team in building the Mobilus wearable voice device in a collaborative environment.  You will be collaborating with fellow engineers, designers, and product managers in agile development with user testing in the loop.  This role will also give our new team member the opportunity to explore new technologies in voice based UX design. 

Main Responsibilities: 
-	Lead the front-End Development of the Mobilus Voice Communication Android and Web Apps
-	Develop and Implement UI with engineering and design teams.
-	Support user testing and development feedback
-	Integrate voice recognition and voice UX functionality

Required skills and experience: 
-	BS in Computer Science or equivalent work experience
-	Strong proficiency in Javascript, HTML, and CSS.
-	Proficient with Illustrator and Photoshop
-	Independent with good communication and team working skills.
-	Attention to detail and an urge to create beautiful things

 “Nice to have” Skills : 
-	Previous experience with voice or messaging applications.

jobs.title: VP of Engineering / CTO
jobs.description:
THE ROLE:
Join an elite engineering-driven team and have an immediate impact on defining what “voice as the next platform” truly means!   Mobilus Labs is looking for a passionate and driven Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to lead Mobilus’ technical team and strategy.  This role will join the team as part of the leadership team to assist in building the Mobilus digital platform in a collaborative environment.  You will be leading a team of engineers, designers, and product managers in agile development with user testing in the loop.  This role will also give you the opportunity to explore new technologies and approaches in advanced networking techniques, VoIP, and Voice Recognition and Voice UX interfaces.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
-	Help lead and grow a world class technical team.
-	Plan and execute the long-term vision of the Mobilus Digital Platform
-	Maintain alignment of the technical roadmap and infrastructure with business objectives.
-	Oversee hardware and software integrations.
-	Represent and communicate Mobilus’ technical excellence to external stakeholders

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE 
-	Previous management experience in tech company (Director, CTO, VP of Engineering)
-	At least 8+ years of software engineering experience 
-	Strong proficiency in Java programming and debugging
-	Previous experience with PaaS or SaaS businesses. 
-	Ability to remain hands-on and up to date on technical frameworks and best practices.
-	Driven, Disciplined, Dependable, and Daring.
 
"NICE TO HAVE" SKILLS:
-	Good knowledge and understanding of the Android SDK, APIs and libraries
-	Proficiency using modern front-end frameworks such as React or AngularJS
-	Experience with voice recognition and transcription libraries and/or APIs
-	Previous experience in leading hardware/software technical teams
